```{r}
library(gapminder)
str(gapminder)
length(gapminder)
head(rownames(gapminder))

head(gapminder$lifeExp)
```

```{r first-plot-base-R}
plot(lifeExp ~ year , gapminder)
plot(lifeExp ~ gdpPercap, gapminder)
plot(gapminder$year, gapminder$lifeExp)
hist(gapminder$lifeExp)
barplot(table(gapminder$continent))
```

